title: Stage S29
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I have plenty of time to finish this project.
Just wait a couple of minutes, please.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 이 프로젝트를 끝낼 시간이 충분히 있어요.
sentences.en: I have plenty of time to finish this project.
Just wait a couple of minutes, please.
I'm a bit tired after the long journey.
There are loads of people at the concert.
She has tons of experience in marketing.

sentences.kr: 그 쿠키 몇 개만 주실 수 있나요?
sentences.en: Could you give me a handful of those cookies?
I need a great deal of patience for this job.
There's quite a lot of traffic today.
I have a tremendous amount of work to do.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 조금은 진전을 보였지만, 많지는 않아요.
sentences.en: She made a little progress, but not much.

sentences.kr: 이 프로젝트를 끝낼 시간이 충분히 있어요.
sentences.en: I have plenty of time to finish this project.
Just wait a couple of minutes, please.
I'm a bit tired after the long journey.
There are loads of people at the concert.
She has tons of experience in marketing.

sentences.kr: 그 쿠키 몇 개만 주실 수 있나요?
sentences.en: Could you give me a handful of those cookies?
I need a great deal of patience for this job.
There's quite a lot of traffic today.
I have a tremendous amount of work to do.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 조금은 진전을 보였지만, 많지는 않아요.
sentences.en: She made a little progress, but not much.
